title: At a party, Alice sat visitors in fives and one remained. When she sat in elevens, right remained. What is the least number of visitors she was able to sit? - Quora

response.answer_text: I assume you mean eight, not right. The number of visitors is 11x+8, or 5y+1 The possible visitors for 11x+8 (knowing that x -- the number of tables -- must be a whole number) are: 19, 30, 41… 41 is the smallest number that can be written as 5y+1.
